resources.string:
Dear students,
As you all know, we warmly welcomed Prof. Jean\-Marc LAVEST to the USTH family as our new Principal Rector from October 1st, 2021. In the Open letter he wrote to you, he expressed his strong belief in current students\' professional life, and expected the development of associations in our university.
Please find the Open letter from our Principal Rector in the attachment.
Best regards.

Notification: Moodle system upgrade on 17/10/2021 and downtime of services
Moodle will have system update from 20:00 to 22:00 17/10/2021 - Sunday which caused the unavailability of services. Systems will be back online afther this duration.
